price: 你不要把自己的手束在脖子上，也不要把手完全伸开，以免你变成悔恨的受责备者。
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ يَدَكَ مَغۡلُولَةً إِلَىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَبۡسُطۡهَا كُلَّ ٱلۡبَسۡطِ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَلُومٗا مَّحۡسُورًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿal yadaka maghlūlatan ilā ʿunuqika walā tabsuṭ'hā kulla al-basṭi fataqʿuda malūman maḥsūran
